articles.title: Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba was held in Pyongyang Tuesday.
					 Present there were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who is chairman the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other members of the solidarity committee and Ambassador Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo and officials of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work conducted by the solidarity committee in the last one year to actively support the just cause of the fraternal Cuban people vigorously struggling for independence against imperialism and for socialism under the leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba, and discussed its action program for this year.

articles.title: Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the embassy Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Attending it were staff members of the Syrian embassy.
					
					 In his speech at the reception, the Syrian ambassador referred to the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il who firmly protected the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and laid a strong foundation for the building of a powerful socialist country with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The Syria-DPRK relations forged by the preceding leaders have continued to develop under the care of Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, said the ambassador, wishing the friendly Korean people fighting against the world imperialists in the first line greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK foreign minister said that Syrian friends' celebration of the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people every year is an expression of boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il and the will of the leadership of Syria to boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries forged by the preceding leaders.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever extend invariable support and encouragement to the righteous struggle of the Syrian government and people to smash the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and Zionists and defend the sovereignty, stability and territorial integrity of the country, he added.

articles.title: Nepalese, Nigerian Figures Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Nepalese, Nigerian Figures Visit DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Nepalese and Nigerian personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their countries on Feb. 1 and 8 on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The chairman and the general secretary of the Central Committee of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal, the national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party and others placed bouquets and flowers at the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Kamal Prasad Chaulagain, chairman of the C.C., the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal, said that the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for army building would always be kept in the minds of not only the Korean people but also the peace-loving progressives of the world.
					
					 Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, said that the Korean People's Army, the regular revolutionary armed forces founded by HE Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, created the myth of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War in the 1950s by making the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, doomed like the setting sun in the west.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the army and people of the DPRK would continue to glorify the tradition of victory handed down century after century.

articles.title: Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Mongolian Juche idea study organization led by N. Bold, chairman of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, and the delegation of the Japanese Juche Idea Study Society led by Yasuhito Fujii, deputy representative of the Gunma Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, went back home on Tuesday.

articles.title: 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
22nd Kimjongilia Festival Closes
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Kimjongilia Festival for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Tuesday.
					 The festival venue drew more than 430,000 people, including officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, citizens of different social standings, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 On the Day of the Shining Star alone, the festival venue was visited by officials and working people of at least 200 units including Kim Il Sung University, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Ministry of Agriculture.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly; Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet; and officials of the festival organizing committee and the units which presented flowers of the sun to the festival, and working people and school youth and children in the city.
					
					 Also attending it were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of Shining Star and other overseas compatriots and members of the association for disseminating and supporting the immortal flower.
					
					 Certificates of the festival prize were awarded to many units, officials, cultivators and individuals, the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 The participation certificates were also conferred on the units, working people and school youth and children who presented the flowers to the festival.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: Diploma to Kim Jong Il from Venezuela
articles.content:
Diploma to Kim Jong Il from Venezuela
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was awarded a diploma from the United Left Party of Venezuela on his birth anniversary.
					 The diploma was conveyed on Feb. 14 to the DPRK ambassador to Venezuela by Felix Jesus Velasquez Castillo, general coordinator of the Federal Political Secretariat of the Party.

articles.title: DPRK's Hwaebul Team Gets Qualification for League Matches of AFC Cup
articles.content:
DPRK's Hwaebul Team Gets Qualification for League Matches of AFC Cup
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The second preliminary match between the DPRK's Hwaebul team and Mongolia's Erchim team belonging to Group I (East Asia) of the 2018 AFC Cup took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang, the DPRK on Tuesday.
					 At the home match, the Hwaebul team beat the Erchim team 3:0.
					
					 Jang Kuk Chol of Hwaebul team scored the first goal at about 27 minutes and Choe Kwang Jin and Jon Chung Il scored at about 41 minutes and 45 minutes respectively.
					
					 The Hwaebul team recorded 7:0 in total points in the two preliminary matches, getting the qualification for the league matches of Group I of the 2018 AFC Cup.
					
					 The league matches of the Group I will start on March 7. The DPRK's April 25 team and Hwaebul team will have the first match on the day.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Chollima Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Chollima Steel Complex
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made field survey of the Chollima Steel Complex.
					 Going round several places of the complex, the premier encouraged the workers and technicians in their efforts.
					
					 A consultative meeting on the field discussed measures for satisfactorily meeting the demand for iron and steel needed for the national economy.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Pothonggang Organic Compound Fertilizer Factory and the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory to take measures to drastically increase the production of compound fertilizer and provide the firm guarantee for increased production of grain and to hasten the production of machines and equipment to be sent to the field of coal industry.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Confrontational Acts of Rejects of Times
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Confrontational Acts of Rejects of Times
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Embarrassed by the DPRK spearheading the situation for improvement of the north-south relations, the conservative group of south Korea has gone desperate in the moves to check its splashing impact.
					 Hong Jun Phyo and other men of the "Liberal Korea Party" are blaming the "government", claiming that it has been taken in by "the north's disturbance tactics" to make a mistake of neutralizing the network for applying the UN sanctions on the north and that visit to the north before its nuclear dismantlement will be evidently an enemy-benefiting act as it will be tantamount to congratulating the nuclear development.
					
					 On February 17, Hong made such invective that the "government is making Phyongchang Olympics Pyongyang Olympics, being deceived by the north's camouflaged peace offensive, and pursuing the pro-north policy hostile toward allies U.S. and Japan."
					
					 Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative media continue spouting vituperation that the "north is lording it over the Olympics as if it is host" and "it has a concealed intention to induce easing sanctions on the north and contradiction between the south and the U.S." In the meantime, the conservative riff-raffs follow wherever our personnel go to hold anti-DPRK rallies.
					
					 The thoughtless acts of the conservative group including the "Liberal Korea Party" are nothing but last-ditch struggling of the rejects of the times driven into the cliff of destruction, being marginalized by the strong trend for national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The art performance of the north's artistes, which made impressive artistic representation of the fact that the Korean nation with the one and the same blood, language and culture can surely achieve peace of the Korean Peninsula and prosperity common to the nation if it courageously advances by pooling intention and will, and the loud chanting of "We are one" made by the cheering group and the response of the south Koreans to it seem to have been heard as death-bell by the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 To the conservative forces staking their fate on the national division while clinging to the U.S., the daily mounting atmosphere for north-south reconciliation and reunification can not but be death-like nightmare.
					
					 That's why the group of traitors is making desperate efforts to chill the hard-won atmosphere for north-south ties, being indifferent to whether the Olympics is disrupted or a war breaks out, only to maintain its dirty remaining days.
					
					 Hong Jun Phyo, Jo Won Jin and other die-hard conservatives' wild vituperation to check the trend for the national reconciliation and unity will only disclose their true nature as despicable imbeciles in human shape, to say nothing of being worth fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should never allow the current atmosphere for reconciliation and dialogue to be undermined and the evil cycle of confrontation between fellow countrymen to repeat itself due to the hysterical act of a handful of conservatives.
					
					 The entire nation should courageously turn out in the struggle to throw overboard the group of traitors, mindful that rooting out the conservative forces including the LKP, a poisonous mushroom and cancer-like entity in the way of achieving reunification, is the way for accelerating peace and reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. to Understand Its Rival
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns U.S. to Understand Its Rival
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Trump group is spouting rubbish that if the DPRK's nuclear issue is not settled through diplomatic way, it can not but take a military option, while clamoring for "possibility of dialogue" with the DPRK.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday brands this as an open threat to mount a military attack if the DPRK does not respond to the denuclearization negotiations.
					
					 It is foolhardy for the U.S. to try to threaten the DPRK with such nonsense and it is nothing but a reckless act ignorant of the faith, will and pluck of Juche Korea, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is a self-defensive nuclear power no one can dare provoke, and we are not afraid of sanctions and pressure as we are exploring our future under the banner of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 We are ready for both dialogue and war.
					
					 If the U.S. attacks the DPRK, it will not be safe in face of a stern punishment by the Korean army and people.
					
					 Recently the trump group is advising the Americans to leave last messages if they want to travel Korea. They had better pay heed to our warning, not making such nonsensical rubbish.
					
					 If the U.S. dare provokes a war, there will never be a man left who would keep last messages and bury the coffins. This is our answer.
					
					 The U.S. has to stop going ill-mannered, clearly understanding who its rival is.

articles.title: Trump's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
Trump's Reckless Remarks under Fire
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Trump in his "state of the union address" threatened to bring down the DPRK through "American-style decisive action" while bluffing the "maximum pressure" on it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says that how hysterically Trump may run amuck, it is taken as nothing but as the shriek made by the mentally deranged man to get rid of the extreme uneasiness before his logic of strength no longer working and before the DPRK that has towered as a strategic state.
					
					 It is foolish to think of bringing to knees through "maximum pressure" the DPRK that has risen as a world-level nuclear power and military power, the commentary jeers, and goes on:
					
					 The Trump group has to worry about the security and future of the U.S. that can be affected by its vicious push to bring down the DPRK through "maximum pressure", being guided by the anachronistic and self-righteous perspective.
					
					 The world has witnessed the U.S. bluffing before the weak but being left helpless before the DPRK, a strong country. Trump's hysteric act will only reveal the servile face of the weak.
					
					 Words will not work on the U.S. going reckless, being carried away by the foolish ambition for world domination.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts U.S. and Its Followers for Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts U.S. and Its Followers for Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently dispatched two Aegis destroyers to the waters around the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of "deterring provocation" by the DPRK.
					 The Japanese reactionaries are calling for "resuming as scheduled" the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises, while giving off chilly air amid the continued reinforcement of the U.S. preemptive strike forces targeting the DPRK.
					
					 These moves are supported by the south Korean conservative forces steeped in the hatred toward the fellow countrymen in the north to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says this is a revelation of the dirty intention to stem the present trend on the Korean Peninsula and ratchet up the tension again, which can never be overlooked.
					
					 The U.S., Japan and the puppet conservative forces are justifying their moves, crying out for the military drill "already scheduled" and "threat" from the DPRK. But this is childish tongue-wagging to keep aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula and meet their interests, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 All facts clearly prove once again what the basic factor that has long prevented genuine peace and stability from settling in the Korean Peninsula and region is. The DPRK will never tolerate any acts of harassing peace and security on the peninsula but will resolutely counter them.
					
					 In case the tension rises again between the north and the south to cause irrevocable consequences, the U.S., Japan and the puppet conservative forces have to bear all blames.

articles.title: Traitor Park Chung-Hee's Crime Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Traitor Park Chung-Hee's Crime Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Yonhap News of south Korea disclosed another fact that traitor Park Chung-Hee hurled airborne commandoes into brutally quelling the October resistance for democracy that broke out in Pusan and Masan to protest the "yusin" fascist dictatorship.
					 The findings of a recent survey made public on Monday revealed that traitor Park ordered the "martial law" commander to send a brigade of airborne commandoes to Masan to suppress the resistance on Oct. 18, 1979.
					
					 Besides, the "martial law" command organized a joint investigation team to conduct a probe into the participants in the resistance and tried to link the force behind them with the DPRK, according to the findings.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 Seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Bangladesh, Indonesia, Russia, Germany, Slovenia, Benin, Nigeria and Mexico between Jan. 19 and 30.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also books and photos dealing with the successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The secretary general of the Chittagong Branch of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said that the special feat of Kim Jong Il is that with his treasured sword of Songun he firmly safeguarded the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world by making a breakthrough in the world political structure centered on big powers led by the U.S.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for strengthening the party, state and army of the DPRK on the basis of the Juche idea and laying solid foundations for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The chairman of the Beninese National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Birth Anniversary of General Kim Jong Il stressed that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to meeting the interests of the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other speakers said that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a nuclear power of Juche and a world military power under the experienced guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Feb. 2 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on the occasion of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies the tasks for brilliantly accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en esta capital la reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, So Ho Won, y otros miembros de la entidad solidaria.
					
					Asistieron tambien el embajador Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					La reunion hizo balance de los trabajos del comite realizados en un ano para apoyar la justa causa del hermano pueblo cubano que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Cuba, lucha energicamente por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo.
					
					Discutio igualmente el plan de trabajo para el presente ano.

articles.title: Regresan las delegaciones extranjeras de estudio de la idea Juche
articles.content:
Regresan las delegaciones extranjeras de estudio de la idea Juche
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se repatriaron hoy la delegacion de la organizacion de estudio de la idea Juche de Mongolia, dirigida por el presidente del Centro Mongol para el Estudio del Juche, N. Bold, y otra de la Sociedad Japonesa de Estudio de la Idea Juche, encabezada por el vice-representante del Consejo de Enlace de Gunma de Estudio del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, Yasuhito Fujii.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo de Acero Chollima
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo de Acero Chollima
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la RPDC, averiguo en el terreno la situacion del Complejo de Acero Chollima.
					Pasando revista a varios puntos del complejo, el estimulo a los obreros e ingenieros que obtienen exitos en su trabajo.
					
					En la reunion consultiva efectuada en el terreno, se discutieron los remedios para suministrar suficientes materiales de hierro y acero que se necesitan en la economia nacional.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier estuvo en la Fabrica de Abono Compuesto Organico Pothonggang y la Fabrica de Aparatos de Automatizacion de Pyongyang. 
					
					En esas visitas, instruyo incrementar decisivamente la produccion de abono organico para garantizar el aumento de cosechas de cereales y tomo las medidas para acelerar la fabricacion de maquinas y equipos a ser enviados al sector de industria carbonera.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la conducta conflictiva de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la conducta conflictiva de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los conservadores surcoreanos andan desesperados para detener las influencias drasticas de la RPDC que desempena el papel directivo en el mejoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					Estos dias, Hong Jun Phyo y otros compinches del Partido de Corea Libre critican con griteria al "gobierno" diciendo que "este comete la falta de neutralizar la red de sancion anti-Norte establecida por la ONU siendo embaucado por la tactica de perturbacion del Norte" y "la visita al Norte, que no toma por su requisito la cancelacion de armas nucleares, no pasa de ser una mision para felicitar su desarrollo nuclear y seria evidentemente un acto pro-enemigo".
					
					Hong chismeo el 17 de febrero que el "gobierno, enganado por la ofensiva de paz simulada del Norte, convirtio los Juegos Olimpicos de Phyongchang en los de Pyongyang y practica la politica pro-Norte y de hostilidad a EE.UU. y Japon que son aliados."
					
					Los medios conservadores surcoreanos, inclusive Chosun Ilbo y Dong-A Ilbo, tambien se dedican a las injurias tales como el "Norte actua como anfitrion en la fiesta ajena" y "tiene la intencion implicita de inducir el relajamiento de sancion y causar discrepancias entre el Sur de Corea y EE.UU." 
					
					Y los tipejos conservadores surcoreanos organizan los mitines anti-RPDC dondequiera que se encuentre el personal norcoreano.
					
					Los susodichos movimientos demenciales no pasan de ser el ultimo pataleo de los desechos de la epoca que se encuentran en el abismo de arruinamiento siendo marginados del torrente de reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion.
					
					El grupo artistico y de hinchas de la RPDC demuestran en escenas artisticas y con gritos de "Corea es una" que los compatriotas homogeneos de la misma sangre, lengua y cultura pueden lograr la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la prosperidad comun de la nacion si marchan con coraje uniendo las voluntades y propositos.
					
					Para los conservadores surcoreanos que se mantienen adulando a EE.UU. y fomentando la division nacional, significa la pesadilla y muerte el clima de reconciliacion N-S y reunificacion.
					
					Por eso, ellos hacen todo lo posible para romper esa atmosfera preparada a duras penas sin hacer caso a que fracasen los juegos olimpicos o se desate la guerra.
					
					La chismografia de Hong Jun Phyo, Jo Won Jin y otros connotados elementos conservadores deja conocer que ellos no son integrantes de nuestra nacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben permitir que por culpa de ese punado de escorias humanas, se rompa el actual clima de reconciliacion y dialogo y se repita el circulo vicioso de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Todos los coreanos deben luchar con valentia por eliminar a los conservadores surcoreanos, inclusive el Partido de Corea Libre, teniendo presente que eso es el atajo a la paz y reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras amenazantes de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras amenazantes de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los compinches de Trump se refieren a la "posibilidad del dialogo" con Corea agregando que no les queda otra alternativa que tomar la opcion militar, si no se resuelve de manera diplomatica el problema nuclear norcoreano.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 20 un comentario individual interpretando que esas palabras significan la amenaza abierta de que asestaria el ataque militar si la RPDC no acepta las negociaciones de desnuclearizacion.
					
					Resulta estupido el acto de asustar a la Corea del Juche con esos disparates amenazantes que no pasan de ser una fanfarronada de quien no conoce ni jota como son la conviccion, voluntad y coraje de ella, asevera el comentarista y continua:
					
					La RPDC es una intocable potencia nuclear autodefensiva.
					
					Ella no teme la sancion ni la presion porque forja su futuro en el principio de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Los militares y habitantes coreanos estan preparados tanto para el dialogo como para la guerra.
					
					Si EE.UU. se atreve a atacar a nuestro pais, nuestros uniformados y habitantes castigaran implacablemente a los agresores yanquis.
					
					A los compinches de Trump seria mejor escuchar atentamente nuestra advertencia, en lugar de decir absurdamente que necesita escribir primero el testamento si alguien quiere viajar a la RPDC.
					
					Les respondemos que si ellos se atreven a imponer la guerra, no quedara ninguno que pueda guardar el testamento o enterrar el ataud.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia conociendo bien a su rival.
